-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | QuasiQuoter and Template Haskell splices for creating proxies at higher-kinds
--   
--   QuasiQuoter and Template Haskell splices for creating proxies at
--   higher-kinds (via <tt>type-spine</tt>'s <tt>k -&gt; *</tt> kind
--   wrappers)
@package tagged-th
@version 0.1


-- | A parser for simple type expressions, including kinds and excluding
--   operators.
module Data.Proxy.TH.Aux
parseIdent :: MonadPlus m => String -> m ([Type], String)
parseProxy_ :: MonadPlus m => String -> m (Type, Kind)
parseProxy :: MonadPlus m => String -> m ((Type, Kind), String)
thProxyT_fail :: Maybe Name -> Q a
instance MonadPlus Q


-- | Quasiquoter and TH-splice generator for proxies using
--   <tt>type-spine</tt>'s <tt>k -&gt; *</tt> kind wrappers.
module Data.Proxy.TH
qProxy :: QuasiQuoter
thProxyT :: Type -> Q Type
thProxy :: Type -> Q Exp
data Proxy p :: * -> *
Proxy :: Proxy p
